meanings.definition: The study of the biological basis of social behavior in animals and humans.
meanings.sent1: Sociobiology helps us understand why animals live together in groups.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use sociobiology to learn how genes influence social interactions.
meanings.sent3: The sociobiology class had a party to observe social behavior in a fun way.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle of life, sociobiology acts as a guide to decipher social codes.
meanings.sent5: The concept of sociobiology paints a vivid picture of how biology shapes social connections.

meanings.definition: The application of evolutionary biology to understanding social behavior.
meanings.sent1: Sociobiology helps scientists see how evolution affects social interactions.
meanings.sent2: The professor explained sociobiology as a tool to study social evolution.
meanings.sent3: At the science fair, the project on sociobiology made everyone laugh with its quirky approach.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of knowledge, sociobiology blooms as a flower of understanding social dynamics.
meanings.sent5: The essence of sociobiology shines a light on the evolution of social structures.
